name: HEAVEN AND HELL - the last war
description: "HEAVEN AND HELL - the last war" is a 2D medieval tower defense gameplay inspired by "plants vs. zombies", but with a dark universe inspired by "dark souls".
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+ Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: wheel on any modern potato
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+ Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: wheel on any modern potato
